text: On Monday night, the Golden State Warriors knocked off the Oklahoma City Thunder...
...in the seventh game of the Western Conference Finals.
This sets them up for a rematch of last year's NBA finals...
The series will kick off Thursday,...
...and while it's the second straight finals these teams will match up,...
...that doesn't mean ticket prices will be any cheaper.
The average list price for Game 1 at Oracle Arena has been reported as high as $1,625.
That's up more than nine percent from last year.
After Game 1, prices are coming down a bit,...
...with the average game after that costing a little over $11,000.
